text: I think one proper difficult situation is this: user presses Alt+Enter, and then immediately edits the file. In that case I think we could just end up in a situation where we "miss" the small window during which the LS has the doc version that was true when Alt+Enter was pressed.

elements.text: I think one proper difficult situation is this: user presses Alt+Enter, and then immediately edits the file. In that case I think we could just end up in a situation where we "miss" the small window during which the LS has the doc version that was true when Alt+Enter was pressed.

text: <@U6BNE7LTZ> not sure what the correct behavior is in this situation. Show an error message to the user, maybe?
